revised_title: Periodical Changes of Brightness in Two Fixed Stars
tldr: The author, Edward Pigott, investigates the periodical changes in brightness of two fixed stars, one in Sobieski's Shield and the other in the Northern Crown. He observes and documents these changes over time, providing valuable information for future astronomers to study and compare. The findings contribute to the understanding of variable stars and their potential use in determining differences in terrestrial longitudes.
